name: VNR Galactic Simplicity
additional_info:
version: 1.3

Features:
Fixed Profile
Fixed Game page - for users with smaller resolution screens. This is compatible for 1028x768 screens.

Known Bugs:
Due to Annot.me's unique website refresh system, for styles to take effect, user needs to manually refresh the page.

Changelog:
1.4 - Bringing galactic sexy back. Adjusted for new Sakuradite layout
1.3 - Sakuradite.com support. Thank you Najizhimo-san
1.2 - Profile font to left
1.1 - Added round avatar effect for games section.

External links:
Bug report/requests: http://annot.me/topic/253
